ModMetaData.name: No Water, No Life - More Drinkables
ModMetaData.author: Lorsieab2
ModMetaData.description:
V1.1 Now Ported from my "Dubs' Bad Hygiene - More Drinkables" Mod!
This XML mod allows modded drinks, liquids and other water/milk-containing things to replenish Water from No Water, No Life. Now you can hydrate by drinking soda, hemogen packs or mineral water from the ground! I tried to add almost every beverage, soup, stew etc. available. There's a chance I missed some things, so please comment if you want me to add a patch for an item. Uncooked soups and stews don't replenish thirst - they need to be cooked first. Same goes for drink precursors (musts, syrups etc). This took a ton of work - feel free to fork/edit/update it! Please credit me though :)
[h3]Patches the following: [/h3] - Core - Biotech - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2883208829] (RH2) Faction: V.O.I.D.
